Class PlayerController

  • java.lang.Object
    • PlayerController
  • public class PlayerController
extends java.lang.Object
    MVC controller for the Gamebook Player that handles all communication between PlayerView (MVC view) and DatabaseModel (MVC model).

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class Description
      private class  PlayerController.LinkButtonListener
      Custom listener based on ActionListener that detects when any link button has been clicked by the user.
      private class  PlayerController.PlayAgainButtonListener
      Custom listener based on ActionListener that detects when the "Play Again" button has been clicked by the user.
      private class  PlayerController.QuitButtonListener
      Custom listener based on ActionListener that detects when the "Quit" button has been clicked by the user.
      private class  PlayerController.WindowCloseListener
      Custom listener based on WindowListener that detects when the user closes the application window, safely exiting the application.

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      void goToPage​(int pageId)
      Populates the UI with the latest page body and links from the database.

      • PlayerController

        public PlayerController​(DatabaseModel databaseModel,

        Constructs the controller, populates the UI and sets up listeners.

        databaseModel - model that handles reading from and writing to a MySQL database
        playerView - view for the Gamebook Player app
